description: cell schema generate by tagSchemaToJson from curated.tight

cell_cycle.description: Stage in cell cycle - G1, S, G2, M or combination like G2/M

id.description: Unique (within project) id for cell for cell-at-a-time assays

type.description: Cell type - something like "fibroblast" or "neuron."  Ideally a term from an ontology

well_quality.description: Note on how good cell looks if imaged in well before sequencing

title: cell
